comment.author: 41373397@N07
comment._content: The gent at right seems very interested in the very interesting mechanism of this little two-truck Shay geared locomotive all the way from the Lima (Lye-muh, not Lee-mah) Locomotive Works in Lima, Ohio, USA.

comment.author: 72791995@N00
comment._content: The Shay is of course very interesting. Thinking of pronouncing a place name correctly, the town of Ebbw Vale on the Brisbane Ipswich line should be pronounced as Ebb-You-Vale and NOT as QR guards say, Ebboo Vale, or Ebby Vale!
